comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by tpopela.

This update has been submitted for stable by tpopela.
This update has been pushed to stable.

Additional fixes:

 * Fix crashes on PowerPC 64.
 * Fix the build on PowerPC 32.
 * Add ARM64 build support.

 * Brazilian Portuguese
 * Russian
 * Chinese.
